name: Seismic Shake-Up: Aftershock [V1.1]
description:
(For LÖVE V10.2) Using .exe is recommended as collisions can break with .love!

Seismic Shake-Up is a Time Travel based platformer where you travel between a city before and after an earthquake, where some can only be passed in one timeline.

This game was  originally made for the LÖVE Game Jam 2022. Jam version available here > https://aid0n.itch.io/seismic-shakeup

Controls:

  • A  and D to move left and right.
  • Space to jump.
  • S to duck.
  • E to pickup boxes.
  • R to time travel (Only works if unlocked)

(All controls are rebindable)

Credits:

  • Simple Tiled Implementation lib  by karai17: https://github.com/karai17/Simple-Tiled-Implementation
  • JSON encoder and decoder lib by Jeffrey Friedl: http://regex.info/blog/lua/json
  • Class lib by Bart Bes.

Unless marked, all other code, sounds and graphics are by me.
